p: Other studies proved that the CEO has an antifungal effect at various concentrations over Alternaria alternata, Stachybotrys chartarum, Cladosporium cladosporioides, and Aspergillus niger [ 8]. The antifungal activity effect of coriander extracts was also proven by Zardini et al. (2012) by studying its effects on P. lilacinum and A. niger [ 9].
